page.title: 02Flooding on Shoreham Beach
page.content: We asked several residents on Shoreham Beach if they liked living there to which the unanimous reply was 'yes'. The next question was 'What are the advantages/disadvantages of living by the sea'.Some of the replies were 'it's a clean environment','quiet','it has the advantages of being on a desert island with none of the inconvenience','it's wild here-untamed'.The disadvantages were 'bad winters','hard to grow plants','you have to paint the house every 2 years','it's often quite windy.' Then we asked if they thought that the houses were too near the sea.The general attitude was that they weren't but some people thought differently Next came 'Have you ever been flooded before?' Only 1 person said 'yes-3 times.'
